title: HTML Layout and Designer Themes
notes: All pre-installed themes begin with underline character, thus will override downloaded versions peridically.

crator.name: Lewis L. Wood
crator.notes: I hope everyone finds these themes useful and beneficial.  Happy coding.

colors.name: main
colors.notes: Default color used throughout the web

colors.name: header
colors.notes: Default colors used by objects in the header area.

colors.name: footer
colors.notes: Default colors used by the objects placed in the footer area.

colors.name: banner
colors.notes: Colors used in the banner area. Typically inherits header colors.

colors.name: menu
colors.notes: Menu bar colors in the header area. Typically inherits from header.

colors.name: navBar
colors.notes: Navigation Bar is similar to menu, but resiexit  in the footer area. Typically inherits footer colors.

colors.name: address
colors.notes: Address bar is the company address and resides in the footer. Typically inherits footer colors.

colors.name: about
colors.notes: About page colors. Typically inherits from main colors.

colors.name: panel-side
colors.notes: Side Panel color. Typically inHeritsfrom Header.

colors.name: panel-left
colors.notes: Lweft side Panel color. Typically inHeritsfrom side panel.

colors.name: panel-right
colors.notes: Right side Panel color. Typically inHeritsfrom side panel.

colors.name: panel-content
colors.notes: Content panel may inHerit from main or custom, depending on you preferences.
